ignoredPatterns.description: Ignore the branches that match this pattern for the cascading

defaultBranch.description: The default branch if you have one, if no candidate found with the given pattern this branch will be the last one where the code will be cascaded (the repository default branch will be used if not defined)

cascadingBranchesPattern.description: Pattern determining if the branch is part of the cascading strategy

versionCapturePattern.description: Pattern containing a capture to extract the version of a cascading branch

bypassReviewers.description: Bypass the reviewers validation for the pull request, only the CI checks will be executed (the application will need to be listed as bypass users)
